languages.text: "Я не боюсь боли, ибо с ней приходит искупление. Вам не помешает однажды усвоить сей урок, госпожа Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: "Я не боюсь боли, ибо с ней приходит искупление. Вам не помешает однажды усвоить сей урок, госпожа Хейдари".

languages.text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."
languages.original_text: "Я не боюсь боли, ибо с ней приходит искупление. Вам не помешает однажды усвоить сей урок, госпожа Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson someday, Mistress Heydari."
"I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson someday, Mistress Heydari."
"I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson someday, Mistress Heydari."
"I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson someday, Mistress Heydari."
"I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."
"I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."

languages.text: « Si je ne crains pas la douleur, c'est parce qu'elle est source de rédemption. C'est une leçon qu'il vous serait profitable de connaître, maîtresse Heydari. »
languages.original_text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: « Si je ne crains pas la douleur, c'est parce qu'elle est source de rédemption. C'est une leçon qu'il vous serait profitable de connaître, maîtresse Heydari. »

languages.text: “我不惧怕痛苦，因为痛苦会带来救赎。总有一天，你也会学到这有益的一课，海达利女士。”
languages.original_text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: “我不惧怕痛苦，因为痛苦会带来救赎。总有一天，你也会学到这有益的一课，海达利女士。”

languages.text: "Ich fürchte den Schmerz nicht, denn er bietet Erlösung. Es würde Euch gut tun, diese Lektion eines Tages zu lernen, Herrin Heydari."
languages.original_text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte den Schmerz nicht, denn er bietet Erlösung. Es würde Euch gut tun, diese Lektion eines Tages zu lernen, Herrin Heydari."

languages.text: «No temo al dolor, pues es el camino a la redención. Le vendría bien aprender esta lección, señora Heydari».
languages.original_text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: «No temo al dolor, pues es el camino a la redención. Le vendría bien aprender esta lección, señora Heydari».

languages.text: 「私は苦痛を恐れません。苦痛は贖罪の機会を提供してくれます。いつか、この教訓を学ぶことは貴女にも利益になるでしょう、ヘイダリ女史」
languages.original_text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: 「私は苦痛を恐れません。苦痛は贖罪の機会を提供してくれます。いつか、この教訓を学ぶことは貴女にも利益になるでしょう、ヘイダリ女史」

languages.text: "Acıdan korkum yok. Zira acı demek, kefaret demektir. Kendi iyiliğin için bu dersi bir gün öğrenmeni dilerim Üstat Heydari."
languages.original_text: "I do not fear pain, for it offers redemption. It would benefit you to learn this lesson one day, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: "Acıdan korkum yok, zira acı demek, kefaret demektir. Kendi iyiliğin için bu dersi bir gün öğrenmeni dilerim Üstat Heydari."
